entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Norway House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
